ValidationRule.description: This to stop users from going from Draft to Approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.Id= LEFT( $Label.PNG_QuoteRecordTypeId ,15), ISCHANGED ( Status), OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.PNG_OpportunityType__c , "ICT"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.PNG_OpportunityType__c, "ICT & GSM"))
, OR ( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ), 'Draft' )&& ISPICKVAL(Status , "Approved")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please set the Status to Needs Review.
